name: Ryan WHEELER, Appellant v. Jeffrey A. BEARD, Secretary of Corrections; Barry Johnson, Secretary-Western Region; Gerald L. Rozum, Superintendent SCI-Somerset; Eric Frazier, Correctional Counselor-SCI-Somerset, Appellees

parties: Ryan WHEELER, Appellant v. Jeffrey A. BEARD, Secretary of Corrections; Barry Johnson, Secretary-Western Region; Gerald L. Rozum, Superintendent SCI-Somerset; Eric Frazier, Correctional Counselor-SCI-Somerset, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of August, 2010, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
Jurisdiction relinquished.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
999 A.2d 589
Ryan WHEELER, Appellant v. Jeffrey A. BEARD, Secretary of Corrections; Barry Johnson, Secretary-Western Region; Gerald L. Rozum, Superintendent SCI-Somerset; Eric Frazier, Correctional Counselor-SCI-Somerset, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 17, 2010.
